Unit Sought: This a petition for a residual election under Armour & Co., 40 NLRB 1332 (1942) and Globe Machine & Stamping, 3 NLRB 294 (1937), under Casehandling Manual 11091.2(a). Petitioner currently represents 27 employees in the housekeeping (including room cleaners and house persons) and guest service attendants (bellperson, doorperson) classifications in the hotel. Peitioner seeks an Armour-Globe election among all remaining non-supervisory employees in the hotel, including all Food and Beverage, Front desk and Maintenance classifications, but excluding statutory supervisors and guards, to be added to the existing unit.
